Text: Me, too but i bought this yeasterday :ras:

The Chinese national wushu team has two exceptional members Jimmy and 
Tiger . They are in L.A to perform exhibitions. Tiger wants to defect 
to L.A. to make a big name for himself but when Jimmy learns his 
frind's plan to defect, an attempt to stop him fails and Jimmy ends up 
missing his flight to China. Jimmy's only hope is Andy, who is a 
wisecracking youngster in Los Angeles. Meanwhile, Tiger works for a 
mafia boss. When Tiger loses a fortune in cocaine in a detergent box 
that Andy accidentally took, Andy and Jimmy soon have no choice but to 
face the wrath of Tiger and his men. Their only ally is Penny, the 
girlfriend of Tiger's boss but the two men who were once best friends 
have now become bitter enemies...For more information go to 
wing-chunws/Dragon%20Fight.html
